product_name: Hero CosmeticsMighty Patch for Fine Lines Patches
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsGive BackRetinol, meet patch. Hero Cosmetics Mighty Patch for Fine Lines targets crowâ€™s feet and frown lines using 1,390 dissolving Micropoints. Featuring star ingredients like retinol, sodium hyaluronate, and niacinamide, it works gently to help renew the look of skin (all without drying it out).
details: DetailsBenefitsTargets fine linesRenews the look of skinGentle on skinFeaturesLeave on for 6-8 hours as Micropoints dissolveContoured designStays in place overnightKey Ingredientsetinol + Adenosine: Helps renew the look of skinSodium Hyaluronate: Moisturizes skinNiacinamide: Brightens skinItem 2624661How To UsePrep your skin. Cleanse and dry the fine line area.Place the patch. Apply and press lightly for 20 seconds.Watch it work. Leave on for 6-8 hours as Micropoints dissolve.Precautions: Use only as directed. For external use only. Some discomfort is to be expected upon application of micropoints. If irritation continues, discontinue use and talk to your doctor. When using this product, wear sunscreen during the day and limit exposure to UV as retinol may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun. It is normal to experience redness, tingling, and/or dryness while using retinol. If this happens, reduce frequency of use.IngredientsSodium Hyaluronate, Water/Aqua/Eau, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Adenosine, Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid, Polysorbate 80, Propanediol, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Sclerotium Gum, Xanthan Gum, Madecassoside, Pentylene Glycol, Centella Asiatica Extract, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Collagen, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Ethylhexylglycerin.
how_to_use: Prep your skin. Cleanse and dry the fine line area.Place the patch. Apply and press lightly for 20 seconds.Watch it work. Leave on for 6-8 hours as Micropoints dissolve.Precautions: Use only as directed. For external use only. Some discomfort is to be expected upon application of micropoints. If irritation continues, discontinue use and talk to your doctor. When using this product, wear sunscreen during the day and limit exposure to UV as retinol may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun. It is normal to experience redness, tingling, and/or dryness while using retinol. If this happens, reduce frequency of use.

reviews.headline: BURNS
reviews.comments: I applied these to my face where i seen fine lines and gently rubbed and it started burning and now have red burns on my face. I wouldn't try this again.

reviews.headline: Love it.
reviews.comments: Seemed to work a little overnight. For sure trying again.

rollup.name: Mighty Patch for Fine Lines Patches
